body_html: Yes I think we could even disable the "readability" checks (bottom of https://clang.llvm.org/extra/clang-tidy/checks/list.html) which check more stylistic things. I'll raise this discussion again once I'm happy with the signal to noise ratio we get from clang-tidy

body: Yes I think we could even disable the "readability" checks (bottom of https://clang.llvm.org/extra/clang-tidy/checks/list.html) which check more stylistic things. I'll raise this discussion again once I'm happy with the signal to noise ratio we get from clang-tidy
